gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਸਿਮਰ ਸਿਮਰ ਪ੍ਰਿਅਾ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਬਿਸਮ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੋਭਾ ਦੇਤ ਮੋਨ ਗਹੇ ਮਨ ਮੁਸਕਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Simar Simar Priaa Praym Ras Bisam Hoi , Sobhaa Dayt Mon Gahay Man Mousakaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a wife recalls her experience of pleasure with her husband and feels happy, becomes quiet and chuckles in her mind exhuming prettiness;

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਅਧਾਨ ਪਰਸੂਤ ਸਮੈ ਰੋਦਤ ਹੈ ਗੁਰਜਨ ਮੁਦਤ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਤਾਹੀ ਲਪਟਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pooran Adhaan Parasoot Samai Rodat Hai , Gurjan Mudat Hvai Taahee Lapataat Hai ?
translation: Just as on completion of her pregnancy, she goes into labour and cries due to pain but the elders of the house feel happy seeing the child and they shower love on him time and again;

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਮਾਨਵਤੀ ਮਾਨ ਤ੍ਰਯਾਗਿ ਕੈ ਅਮਾਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਪਾੲਿ ਚੁਪ ਹੁਲਸਤ ਗਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Maanavatee Maan Tyaagi Kai Amaan Hoi , Praym Ras Paai Choup Hulasat Gaat Hai ?
translation: Just as an honoured pretty woman sheds her pride and arrogance and becomes humble, and on receipt of her husband's love when united with him becomes quiet and smiles within.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਭਗਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ ਜਾਸ ਬੋਲਤ ਬੈਰਾਗ ਮੋਨ ਗਹੇ ਬਹੁ ਸੁਹਾਤ ਹੈ ॥੬੦੫॥
transliteration: Taisay Gurmoukh Praym Bhagati Prakaas Jaasa , Bolat Bairaag Mon Gahay Bahu Suhaat Hai ?605?
translation: Similarly, an obedient disciple of True Guru who experiences light divine as a result of his loving, perpetual meditation on Naam blessed by the Guru, he earns much respect and praise whether he speaks in a detached mood or goes silent in ecstasy.  (605)
